option.od: print the help message and exit.
print the RST version number and exit.
verbose. Log information to the console.
extract only those records with the program identifier cp.
extract only those records from channel channel.
filename of the fitacf format file.

synopsis.p: Creates a snd format file from a fitacf format file.

description.p: Creates a snd format file from a fitacf format file.
The snd file is written to standard output.

example.description: Create a snd format file from the fitacf file named "20040830.gbr.fitacf", the output file is called "20040830.gbr.snd".
